column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tarrlok says : " Republic City stands as a beacon of freedom , but the Equalists are using that freedom to tear it down .
#Text=You ca n't punish all nonbenders for the actions of a few !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " That kind of cowardice will cause our city to fall into Amon 's hands .
#Text=We must pass this law .
#Text=All in favor ?
#Text=" Police dispatcher says : " All available units , please respond to the fifty six hundred block of Dragon Flats borough .
#Text=Equalists have taken to the streets , consider them armed and dangerous .
#Text=Proceed with caution .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I call front !
#Text=" Mako says : " After you .
#Text=" Korra says : " What a gentleman , thanks !
#Text=" Korra says : " Why is the power out ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Wait a second , these people are n't armed or dangerous .
#Text=" Korra says : " Sure does n't look that way .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " All nonbenders , return to your homes immediately .
#Text=" Male # 1 says : " Yeah , as soon as you turn our power back on .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " Disperse , or you will all be arrested .
#Text=" Female # 1 says : " You benders ca n't treat us this way !
#Text=" Child # 1 says : " Mummy , look !
#Text=It 's the Avatar !
#Text=" Female # 1 says : " Please , help us !
#Text=You 're our Avatar , too !
#Text=" Korra says : " Everyone , please stay calm .
#Text=I 'm gon na put a stop to this .
#Text=Tarrlok , you need to turn the power back on and leave these people alone .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Avatar Korra , you and your playmates have no business here .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 're not going anywhere .
#Text=You do n't have the right to treat these innocent people like criminals .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " This is an Equalist rally .
#Text=There is nothing innocent about it .
#Text=" Asami says : " They 're not Equalists , they 're just normal people who want their rights back .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " They are the enemy !
#Text=Round up all these Equalists !
#Text=" Korra says : " Stop !
#Text=" Asami says : " Hey !
#Text=Let me go !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " You 're under arrest !
#Text=" Mako says : " What ?
#Text=You ca n't do that !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Actually , I can .
#Text=She 's a nonbender out past curfew and her father is a known Equalist conspirator .
#Text=" Mako says : " Let her go !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Arrest him and his brother !
#Text=" Korra says : " Tarrlok !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Unless you want to join your friends in prison , I suggest you put those down and go back to the Air Temple .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , listen to him .
#Text=It 's not worth it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We 'll be all right .
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't worry , I 'll call Tenzin .
#Text=He can get you out .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " So sad to see your little Team Avatar broken up .
#Text=You had a good run .
#Text=" Korra says : " This is n't over , Tarrlok .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Oh , I believe it is .
#Text=Take them away .
#Text="
